answers.answer: I am plus size (size 18-20) and I am 31 weeks!! I have actually been having a good pregnancy besides fatigue!! Also it took a while for me to actually look pregnant but its no denying it now!! Im having a girl August 17 named Giselle how about you??
I'm plus sized and I just had my little angel in April no complications at all!! Plus sized and pregnant just means the baby has more room to grow:-)

Hi i am also plus size (18-20) i am 25  and i am 28 weeks i had some complications!! at the beginning spotting then bed rest then low line pacenta and now i had to get shots stop contractions but i would go true this a million times to have my baby girl!!
I'm also plus size (16/18) I'm 21 and I'm 24wks 5days with some complications. But nothin major.

I'm plus size! I was an 18 due to losing toooons of weight now I am gaining it back little by little lol i'm only 14w but have gained a lil extra than I should have so far.....no complications yet that I know of, praying I won't have any! Glad to see there are other plus sized mommies on here and with no complications! (: good luck ladies!

I'm plus (size 18) and I would love to have new friends I'm currently on really light duty partial bedrest because I was having contractions and I'm only 33 + 6 weeks and they wanna keep her in there until she's at least 36 weeks but at my lkast u/s she was measuring 4 weeks ahead so I don't know wat that's suppose to mean

I'm 26 and I'm plus size I'm not sure if I'm prego yet I've been off mu depo since march last year and last month I got my period lasted 7 days but I had sex 3 days after now I'm 4 days late I've never missed a period b for ever, if anyone can help plz do thnx

I'm plus size and pregnant... Was a size 20_22 pre pregnancy. So far I've had less complications than a friend who is size 12 and due the day after me! The only real thing I've suffered from is fatigue (touch wood) I'm currently 30 weeks 3days pregnant with a little girl and due August 20th! Im currently still working fulltime but finish in 2weeks. Good luck with the remainder of your pregnancy I hope it all goes smoothly.

I'm 27 years old and I'm also a plus size (16/18) mommy to be.  I'm 37w and 4days.....my prepregnancy weight was 227 now I'm 250 and who knows how much I'll weigh at my appt. today.....im soooo worried about my errihht gain, but so far me and my lil girl r healthy....no diabetes, high blood pressure, nor anemia....17 more.days!!
I'm plus size (20) and 35w 1day. The only problem I am having is weight gain in this last trimester! I had only gained 5lbs by 28w and at 34w I had gained a total of 31lbs!

With my daughter I went from 180-240 60lb gain I kno crazy that was in 2010 now im pregnant with my son I didnt lose any weight from my daughter I gained 40lbs since n im 39+6 now I can feel the weight difference my body hurts all the time I am unhappy of my weight but am more than willing to try to lose is weight can be lost so im not too worried for time being

I'm 19 and was 240 pre-preg about size 16. I'm now 36 weeks and currently almost 330 and have no idea what size I am lol i've been in sweat pants and pjs my entire pregnancy though. I mostly ballooned after finding out my baby has multiple congenital heart defects, I haven't had any complications other than a gestional diabetes scare that came back normal and also in and out of the hospital and constant 24 urine tests and bloodwork for high blood pressure and pre-clampsia (which is hormone related not weight)

I am also a plus size women in around 18-20 maybe a 22 depending the make before prego and was weighing 297lbs pre pregnancy and im 5'10-5'11. i am now 36 weeks 4 days and im weighing 319...haven't had any major problems no GEST . DIABETES. no pre eeclampsia even though im being monitored due to weight..all in all had a wonderful pregnancy thus far not expecting to make it to my due date doc is concerned about weight and putting on more may bring on pre e so im looking forward to having my baby girl around 38 weeks...we too can have healthy pregnancies and im just one of many proofs ...
Hello ladiesIts so nice to see there are plus size females out here. Thanx everyone for commenting. Id love to meet new friends its nice to know

Size 16/18 and 26weeks along!  Ive had a complication free pregnancy so far (knock on wood) ive gained 15lbs so far. Midwife says I'm right on track. Only thing they bothers me is my hips. Oh my goodness at night is the worst!

Plus size too. 22 pr-preg. Im 36 wks 5 day. Was 248 now 263. Seven pounds gained in the past week. I tend to lose 15 lbs up front when preg. Nit sure why I'm gaining so quickly these day. Doc ran tests and all is normal.I've had no complications except for back pain. My biggest problem.is finding maternity clothes. There have been a few melt downs at Motherhood

question: Hey ladies. So im just gonna post this in hopes that maybe just maybe there will be someone in my shoes. I am a plus size female and am 33 weeks and 3 days pregnant.  I am wondering who else is out there a plus size female and pregnant. If you have any struggles because of your weight and being pregnant. Looking to hopefully make new friends and possibly help eachother through the rest of this beautiful journey.... hope to hear from someone...,Jennifer. Ps. Im a size 26-28
title: Plus Size &  pregnant
